body:
Notification bar looks like this: 
![validation-demo](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/856935/16031213/86b2b6b0-31f0-11e6-8868-3a896fb5db3c.gif) 

Fixed-positioned to the top of the page, figure we can use it for additional messages in the future. It'll disappear and remove the message automatically after ~10 seconds if you don't click the 'x'.  The field-level validation isn't in this PR but will come in a follow-up one
